# text

**Instance Property**

The current or starting search text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var text: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`.

## Getting the search text

- **placeholder**: The string to display when there’s no other text in the text field.
- **prompt**: A single line of text displayed at the top of the search bar.
- **searchTextField**: The text field that the user enters a search query into.
